columns.name: workload_id
columns.description: The ID assigned to the workload.

columns.name: include_shared_resources
columns.description: Set to true to have shared resources included in the report.

columns.name: base64_string
columns.description: The Base64-encoded string representation of a lens review report. This data can be used to create a PDF file. Only returned by GetConsolidatedReport when PDF format is requested.

columns.name: lenses_applied_count
columns.description: The total number of lenses applied to the workload.

columns.name: metric_type
columns.description: The metric type of a metric in the consolidated report. Currently only WORKLOAD metric types are supported.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: The date and time when the consolidated report was updated.

columns.name: lenses
columns.description: The metrics for the lenses in the workload.

columns.name: risk_counts
columns.description: A map from risk names to the count of how many questions have that rating.
